name: Friday Challenge - Player Feedback
description:
In under 2 hours on Twitch, we built on the Unity Learn 2D Platformer Template to explain game mechanics to the player with simple visual cues.

We've added a speed-up effect that is triggered when you collect a number of pickups, UI that shows intuitively how many more you pickups you need for the next goal and visual effects to communicate when you reach it.

Watch the VOD here, or check out the source code here.
